title: Came here to say hi to BROPORO
body: Its a new account and it wont let me make a post in other sections of the boards even though i am lvl 10 and minimum requirement is 6. Hopefully my profile updates after the activity of making this post. So yeah, HI.

replies.body:
Ayyyoooo!!! Thanks for the shoutout xD!

Sometimes these boards accounts go all wonky and need a little nudge to make sure they update properly. I'm going to resync your account from my end, but let me know if you still aren't able to make that post!
